Octobre

CNSP – Congrès National des Sapeurs-pompiers - Marseille

14octalldayCNSP – Congrès National des Sapeurs-pompiers - Marseille

Description

The Congrès national des sapeurs-pompiers is both a trade show, an opportunity to examine the French model of civil security and a time for friendly exchanges for firefighters from all

more

Description

The Congrès national des sapeurs-pompiers is both a trade show, an opportunity to examine the French model of civil security and a time for friendly exchanges for firefighters from all the departmental fire and rescue services in France. It is also a unique opportunity for companies involved in the world of civil security and internal security to exchange ideas and present the progress and technological advances of French and European know-how.

The 127th edition of the National Congress of the French Fire Brigade will take place in Marseille, in the Bouches-du-Rhône department (13), from 14 to 17 October 2020!

Quand ?

Octobre 14 (Mercredi) - 17 (Samedi)

En savoir plus

Future Force Forum - 2020

21octalldayFuture Force Forum - 2020“Future needs – today’s business”

Description

Future Forces Exhibition is a highly recognised international event in the field of defence and security, organised every two years in Prague and officially supported by the Czech Ministry of

Description

Future Forces Exhibition is a highly recognised international event in the field of defence and security, organised every two years in Prague and officially supported by the Czech Ministry of Defence, the Armed Forces, the Ministry of the Interior, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Industry and Trade, the NATO Headquarters Civil and Military Services, the European Defence Agency (EDA) and many other relevant national and international institutions, organisations and agencies.

Quand ?

Octobre 21 (Mercredi) - 23 (Vendredi)

You can choose to allow or refuse the types of cookies that are not essential for the proper functioning of our site.

Necessary

Necessary

Always Enabled

Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. This category only includes cookies that ensures basic functionalities and security features of the website. These cookies do not store any personal information.

Non Necessary

Any cookies that may not be particularly necessary for the website to function and is used specifically to collect user personal data via analytics, ads, other embedded contents are termed as non-necessary cookies. It is mandatory to procure user consent prior to running these cookies on your website.
